1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 # -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
3 
4 from __future__ import print_function
5 import os
6 import sys
7 import requests
8 import catkin_pkg
9 from catkin_pkg.packages import find_packages
10 
11 
12 def create_header(ros_ubuntu_dict):
13  ros_distros = sorted(ros_ubuntu_dict.keys())
14  section_header = "### ROS Buildfarm\n"
15  header = "MoveIt Package"
16  header_lines = "-" * len(header)
17  for ros in ros_distros:
18  source = " ".join([ros.capitalize(), "Source"])
19  debian = " ".join([ros.capitalize(), "Debian"])
20  header = " | ".join([header, source, debian])
21  header_lines = " | ".join([header_lines, "-" * len(source), "-" * len(debian)])
22  return "\n".join([section_header, header, header_lines])
23 
24 
25 def define_urls(target, params):
26  if target == "src":
27  params["job"] = "{R}src_u{U}__{package}__ubuntu_{ubuntu}__source".format(
28  **params
29  )
30  params["url"] = "{base_url}/view/{R}src_u{U}/job/{job}".format(**params)
31  elif target == "bin":
32  params[
33  "job"
34  ] = "{R}bin_u{U}64__{package}__ubuntu_{ubuntu}_amd64__binary".format(**params)
35  params["url"] = "{base_url}/view/{R}bin_u{U}64/job/{job}".format(**params)
36 
37 
38 def create_line(package, ros_ubuntu_dict):
39  ros_distros = sorted(ros_ubuntu_dict.keys())
40  line = "\n" + package
41  print(package, file=sys.stderr)
42  for ros in ros_distros:
43  ubuntu = ros_ubuntu_dict[ros]
44  params = dict(
45  R=ros[0].upper(),
46  U=ubuntu[0].upper(),
47  ubuntu=ubuntu.lower(),
48  package=package,
49  base_url="http://build.ros.org",
50  )
51  for target in ["src", "bin"]:
52  define_urls(target, params)
53  response = requests.get(params["url"]).status_code
54  # we want to show a particular OS's badges to indicate they are not released / working yet
55  if response < 400 or ubuntu == "focal": # success
56  line += " | [![Build Status]({base_url}/buildStatus/icon?job={job})]({url})".format(
57  **params
58  )
59  else: # error
60  line += " | "
61  print(
62  " {}: {} {}".format(ros, response, params["url"]), file=sys.stderr
63  )
64 
65  return line
66 
67 
68 def create_moveit_buildfarm_table():
69  """
70  Creates MoveIt buildfarm badge table
71  """
72  # Update the following dictionary with the appropriate ROS-Ubuntu
73  # combinations for supported distribitions. For instance, in Noetic,
74  # remove {"indigo":"trusty"} and add {"noetic":"fbuntu"} with "fbuntu"
75  # being whatever the 20.04 distro is named
76  supported_distro_ubuntu_dict = {
77  "kinetic": "xenial",
78  "melodic": "bionic",
79  "noetic": "focal",
80  }
81 
82  all_packages = sorted(
83  [package.name for _, package in find_packages(os.getcwd()).items()]
84  )
85  moveit_packages = list()
86  other_packages = list()
87  for package in all_packages:
88  if package.startswith("moveit"):
89  moveit_packages.append(package)
90  else:
91  other_packages.append(package)
92  moveit_packages.extend(other_packages)
93 
94  buildfarm_table = create_header(supported_distro_ubuntu_dict)
95  for package in moveit_packages:
96  buildfarm_table += create_line(package, supported_distro_ubuntu_dict)
97  print(buildfarm_table)
98 
99 
100 if __name__ == "__main__":
101  sys.exit(create_moveit_buildfarm_table())
